name: RICHCODE富豪密码
detailed_description:
《Rich code》is a online games about investment,breaking the habit of thinking about making money. It makes us know the secret of making money:ordinary people depend on their wages and the rich rely on many investments. Ordinary people spend money on consumption and the rich spend money on investments. The more investment projects bring the more profit.The rich pay attention to monthly income and positive cash flow of the investment.

Resign and start a business?
NO,you can invest some projects while working as usual and you also have chance to be rich .
Let us see your potential of being rich man.

Game Introduce:
You will meet all kinds of business events,such as rolling the dice、guessing the size of the finger-guessing game、 fortune roulette、bank、out of work、extra cost、investment and so on. You must choice the right investments and gain income.
Your goal is that monthly revenue from investments is greater than monthly expenditure. Who will achieve the goal,who will win the game.
It is a relaxed and pleased game. You only need to buy and sell in it.
A successful businessman has a principle that he buy at a low price and sell at a higher price.

Three module:
1.The secret of fortune. It is simple and making the players know the basic gameplay.
2.The road to the Duke. It tells us the loan at the suitable rates plays a huge role in business .Borrowing can help you make money faster.
3.The contention of honor. You will meet a lot of competition ,so rise to the challenge and defeat every opponent.

There are three choices: 2 person games、4 person games and self build room in every module. You can invite your friends to play in your self build room . There are up to 6 people in each room.

short_description: 《Rich code》is a relaxed online games about investment. You only buy and sell in it. There are lots of business invents to test your business vision and strategy. It is a financial game for family and friends.
